text:
DoubleTree by Hilton expands presence in New York State   
Aug 27, 2015 eTN   
NANUET, NY & MCLEAN, VA - DoubleTree by Hilton debuts its newest New York offering today with DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet, a modern 156-room hotel located near the Village of Nyack. Previously a Comfort Inn and Suites, the hotel has completed a multi-million dollar renovation that includes a total redesign of the lobby, fully-updated guest rooms and revamped public areas. DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet is owned by Rockland Hospitality Associates, LLC and managed by Palisades Lodging Corporation. 
“With beautifully-remodeled guest rooms, studio suites and king suites, DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet will be a premier destination for travelers visiting this picturesque northeast town,” said John Greenleaf, global head, DoubleTree by Hilton. “We look forward to bringing our brand’s award-winning service and care-focused culture to guests at this exemplary hotel, starting with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie welcome.” 
The four-story DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet showcases a sleek new design marked by spacious public areas, high-quality furnishings and granite and marble accents throughout the property. Guests will feel at home in the hotel’s inviting rooms featuring all modern accommodations and an array of complimentary amenities, including Wi-Fi throughout the hotel’s public areas and guest rooms, a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour fitness center featuring Precor equipment, indoor solarium-style pool with retractable roof, indoor hot tub and outdoor sun deck. The hotel also offers complimentary shuttle service within a five mile radius of the hotel from Monday through Friday. 
DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet introduces a new restaurant, Windsor Grille Bar and Lounge, featuring locally-sourced ingredients on a dynamic menu with signature items ranging from hand-cut steaks to freshly-prepared seafood. For guests seeking a true culinary experience, the restaurant offers a prix fix menu that changes weekly. Guests can also start their day with the brand’s Wake Up DoubleTree Breakfast and cooked-to-order specialties in Solaris Café, while those preferring to dine in the comfort of their room can conveniently order room service. 
Featuring nearly 6,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, DoubleTree Hilton Nanuet is the perfect setting for gatherings of up to 410 people. Among the hotel’s event spaces are two meeting rooms and a grand ballroom that can be separated into four areas. For smaller groups, the hotel offers the Meetings Simplified by DoubleTree by Hilton package from $49 per person, which includes the meeting room, basic meeting Wi-Fi, meeting room supplies including a flipchart, markers, extension and power cord, and all day non-alcoholic beverage service. Catering services and a dedicated events staff are available to enhance any event. 
“In recent years, our beautiful city has been highlighted nationally among the best places to live, and it's easy for anyone who visits Nanuet to see just why. A scenic backdrop that includes the Hudson River and sprawling Bear Mountain Range creates an ideal destination where guests can enjoy world-class restaurants, shopping and outdoor activities,” said Jeff Weinberger, general manager, DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet. “We look forward to carrying on DoubleTree by Hilton’s tradition of providing guests with a first-rate travel experience while they enjoy everything Nanuet has to offer.” 
Conveniently situated in historic Rockland County, DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet is centrally-located, just 25 miles from New York City and 28 miles from the United States Military Academy at West Point. The hotel is also a convenient drive from Bear Mountain State Park, Dominican College, Nyack College and St. Thomas Aquinas College. Guests seeking shopping destinations will enjoy convenient access to Palisades Center Mall and Woodbury Common Premium outlets, both just a short distance from the hotel. 
In addition to the warm chocolate chip cookie welcome, guests will enjoy other DoubleTree by Hilton brand amenities, including an assortment of gourmet in-room tea and coffee choices from The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf®, the refreshing London-based Aroma Actives natural skin and body care line, and an industry-recognized service culture built around the idea of CARE, which stands for Create a Rewarding Experience for guests, team members and the community. 
DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet participates in the Hilton HHonors® loyalty program, which is open to all guests and free to join - visit here for enrollment information. HHonors members always get our lowest price with our Best Price Guarantee, along with HHonors Points, free standard Wi-Fi, access to digital check-in and Digital Key, and no hidden fees, only when they book directly through Hilton. To mark the hotel’s opening, Hilton HHonors members will earn 1,000 bonus points per night – up to 4,000 points per stay – on the best available rate for stays booked from Sundays – Thursdays September 15 through March 15, 2016. Based on availability, Gold and Diamond members will also enjoy free premium Wi-Fi and upgrades to the hotel’s exclusive Hilton HHonors floor. Additionally, Diamond Hilton HHonors guests will enjoy complimentary Wake Up DoubleTree Breakfast and 1,000 bonus points, and Gold Hilton HHonors guests will have the option of complimentary continental breakfast or 1,000 bonus points. 
DoubleTree by Hilton Nanuet is located at 425 State Route 59, Nanuet, New York, 10954.
